component.source:
<div class="dnd_module">
<style>
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .xans-board-title { overflow:hidden; position:relative; padding:18px 45px 19px 56px; border-top:1px solid #eee; background:#fff; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .xans-board-title h2.title { font-size:15px; text-align:center; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .xans-board-title .btnBack { overflow:hidden; position:absolute; left:17px; top:19px; width:20px; height:20px; font-size:1px; line-height:0; color:transparent; background:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/detail/btn_title_back.png') no-repeat 0 0; background-size:20px auto; }

.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input, textarea, select { max-width:100%; font-size:13px; color:#000; vertical-align:middle; outline:0; border-radius:0; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type=text], input[type=password], input[type=number], input[type=tel], textarea {
    padding:10px; font-size:13px; line-height:13px; font-weight:inherit; color:#353535; border:1px solid #dedfe2; border-radius:0; outline-style:none;
    -moz-box-sizing:border-box; -webkit-box-sizing:border-box; box-sizing:border-box;
}
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type=text], input[type=password], input[type=number], input[type=tel] { height:36px; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type=text]:focus, input[type=password]:focus, input[type=number]:focus, input[type=tel]:focus { border-color:#000; color:#000; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type="file"] { overflow:hidden; max-width:100%; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type="button"], input[type="text"], input[type="password"], input[type="tel"], input[type="image"], textarea { -webkit-appearance:none; }

.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c select { max-width:100%; height:36px; margin:0; padding:0 20px 0 12px; border:1px solid #dedfe2; border-radius:0; font-size:13px; line-height:36px; color:#000; word-break:break-all; font-weight:inherit; -webkit-appearance:none; cursor:pointer; background:#fff url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/layout/form/bg_select.gif') no-repeat 100% 0; background-size:20px auto; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c select:focus { border-color:#000; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c select::-ms-expand { display:none; } /* ie selectbox 화살표 제거 */
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c select.disabled, select:disabled,
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c textarea.disabled, textarea:disabled { color:#bcbcbc; }

.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c textarea { resize:none; line-height:1.2em; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c textarea.disabled { background-color:#fff; color:#bfbfbf; }

.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type="radio"] { width:20px; height:20px; border:0; cursor:pointer; background:url("//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/layout/form/bg_radio.png") no-repeat 0 0; background-size:20px 20px; -webkit-appearance:none; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type="radio"]:checked { background-image:url("//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/layout/form/bg_radio_checked.png"); }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type="radio"]:disabled { background-image:url("//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/layout/form/bg_radio_disabled.png"); }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c label { display:inline-block; margin:0 7px 0 0; min-height:20px; line-height:20px; font-size:13px; vertical-align:middle; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type=radio] + label { margin:0 7px 0 4px; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c label input[type=radio] { margin:0 4px 0 0; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c label:last-child,
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type=radio] + label:last-child { margin-right:0; }

.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type="checkbox"] { width:20px; height:20px; border:0; cursor:pointer; background:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/layout/form/bg_checkbox.png') no-repeat 0 0; background-size:20px auto; -webkit-appearance:none; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type="checkbox"]:checked { background-image:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/layout/form/bg_checkbox_checked.png'); }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type="checkbox"]:disabled { background-image:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/layout/form/bg_checkbox_disabled.png'); }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type="checkbox"]:readonly { background-image:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/layout/form/bg_checkbox_disabled.png'); }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type="checkbox"]:disabled + label { color:#abaeb5; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type="checkbox"]:readonly + label { color:#abaeb5; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c input[type="checkbox"] { margin:0 4px 0 0; }

.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c { background:#fff; }

.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .boardReadPackage { padding:0 0 10px; background:#f6f8fa; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .boardReadPackage .brdProduct .productInfo { padding:12px 8px; background:#f6f8fa; }

.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdProduct .productInfo .prdBox { display:-webkit-flex; display:-ms-flex; display:flex; padding:7px 0; border:1px solid #e5e9f2; background:#fff; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdProduct .productInfo .thumbnail { overflow:hidden; width:68px; height:68px; margin:0 0 0 7px; box-sizing:border-box; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdProduct .productInfo .thumbnail > .link { display:block; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdProduct .productInfo .thumbnail img { width:100%; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdProduct .productInfo .description { -webkit-flex:1; -ms-flex:1; flex:1; overflow:hidden; margin:5px 16px; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdProduct .productInfo .description .prdName { display:block; font-weight:normal; font-size:0; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdProduct .productInfo .description .prdName a { display:inline-block; margin:0 6px 0 0; font-size:12px; line-height:18px; color:#000; text-decoration:none; word-break:break-all; vertical-align:middle; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdProduct .productInfo .description .prdName img { margin:0 2px 0 0; vertical-align:middle; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdProduct .productInfo .description .info li { font-size:12px; line-height:18px; color:#000; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdProduct .productInfo .description .btnDetail { display:inline-block; margin:5px 0 0; font-size:12px; line-height:17px; color:#0078ea; text-decoration:none; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdProduct .productInfo .description .btnDetail:after { content:''; display:inline-block; width:7px; height:10px; margin:3px 0 0 6px; vertical-align:top; background:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/board/ico_detail.png') no-repeat 0 0; background-size:7px auto; }

.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .boardReadPackage .brdRead { border-bottom:1px solid #e5e9f2; background:#fff; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head { padding:17px 16px 16px; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head h3.subject { font-weight:normal; font-size:15px; line-height:20px; color:#000; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head h3.subject .adminAnswer { margin:0 0 10px; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .info { margin:10px 0 0; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .info,
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .info a { font-size:12px; color:#999; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .info .point { display:inline-block; height:10px; margin:1px 3px 0 0; vertical-align:top; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .info > span:before { content:''; display:inline-block; width:1px; height:8px; margin:3px 8px 0; vertical-align:top; background:#dddee0; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .info > span:first-child:before,
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .info > span.point + span:before { display:none; }

.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .append { margin:3px 0 0; font-size:0; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .append > span { display:inline-block; font-size:12px; color:#999; vertical-align:middle; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .append > span:before { content:''; display:inline-block; width:1px; height:8px; margin:3px 8px 0; background:#dddee0; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .append > span.point + span:before,
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .append > span:first-child:before { display:none; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .append .vote { float:right; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .append .vote:before { display:none; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .append .vote .button { display:inline-block; border:1px solid #dedfe2; border-radius:4px; height:28px; padding:0 12px; font-size:12px; line-height:26px; color:#0078ea; text-align:center; text-decoration:none; box-sizing:border-box; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .head .description .append .vote .button:before { content:''; display:inline-block; width:12px; height:13px; margin:0  5px 0 0; vertical-align:middle; background:url('//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/board/ico_vote.png') no-repeat 0 0; background-size:12px auto; }

.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .body { padding:10px 16px; font-size:13px; color:#5d5d5d; line-height:20px; word-break:break-all; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .body .image { text-align:center; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .body img { display:inline-block; margin:0 0 16px; max-width:100%; }
.dnd_module_d9534547b5aaccf62b8e92836ccb639c .brdRead .body .attach { position:relative; margin:21px 0 0; padding:0 0 0 18px; line-height:20px; }

                <div class="info">
                    <span class="point {$config.is_use_point|display}"><img src="//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/board/ico_star{$point_count}.png" alt="{$point_count}점" height="10"></span>
                    <span class="id" title="작성자">{$member_icon}{$writer}<span class="{$config.display_ip|display}">(ip:{$ip})</span> {$admin_mileage}</span>
                </div>
                <div class="append">
                    <span class="date {$config.use_date|display}" title="작성일">{$write_date}</span>
                    <span class="{$config.use_cnt|display}">조회 {$hit_count}</span>
                    <span class="{$config.is_use_recom|display}">추천 {$vote_count}</span>
                    <span class="vote {$config.is_use_recom|display}">
                        <a href="#none" class="button" onclick="{$action_vote}">추천</a>
                    </span>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="body">
            <div class="image">{$content_image}</div>
            {$content}
            <div class="attach {$config.use_attach|display}" title="첨부파일">
                {$attach_file}
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="foot">
            <div class="formGroup">
                <span class="gLeft">
                    <a href="/board/product/reply.html{$param_reply}" class="button {$reply_button_auth|display}">답변쓰기</a>
                </span>
                <span class="gRight">
                    <a href="/board/product/modify.html{$param_modify}" class="button {$modify_button_auth|display}">수정</a>
                    <button type="button" class="button {$delete_button_auth|display}" onclick="{$action_delete}">삭제</button>
                </span>
            </div>

            <div class="passwordGroup {$delete_button_auth|display}">
                <div class="password {$board_password_type}">
                    <span class="form {$config.use_password|display}">{$form.password}</span>
                    <p class="help {$config.use_password|display}">비밀번호 입력후 수정 혹은 삭제해주세요.</p>
                </div>
            </div>
            <a href="{$link_board_list}" class="btnList">목록보기</a>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div module="board_CommentPackage_4" class="boardCommentPackage">
    <div class="brdCmtTitle">
        <h3>댓글목록</h3>
    </div>

    <div module="board_commentempty_4" class="empty">
        등록된 댓글이 없습니다.
    </div>

    <div module="board_commentlist_4" class="brdCmtList">
        <!--
        	$delete_page_url = /board/product/comment_del.html
            $delete_success_url = /board/product/read.html
        -->
        <ul class="brdCmt">
            <li class="{$comment_reply_css}" id="{$comment_reply_id}">
                <div class="info">
                    <span class="point {$config.is_use_point|display}">
                        <img src="//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/board/ico_star{$comment_point_count}.png" alt="{$comment_point_count}점" height="10">
                    </span>
                    <span class="writer" title="작성자">{$comment_name}</span>
                    <span class="regdate" title="작성일">{$comment_write_date}</span>
                </div>
                <div class="comment">
                    <span class="spam {$is_spam_display|display}"><img src="//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/board/ico_spam.png" alt="스팸글" width="13"></span>
                    <span class="icon">{$icon_mobile}{$comment_icon_lock}</span>{$comment_content}
                </div>
                <div class="formGroup">
                    <div class="gLeft">
                        <button type="button" class="btnReply replyList {$comment_reply_list_display|display}" onclick="{$action_comment_view}">댓글의 댓글<span class="number">{$comment_reply_count}</span></button>
                    </div>
                    <div class="gRight">
                        <button type="button" class="button theme1" onclick="{$action_comment_update_new}">수정</button>
                        <button type="button" class="button theme1" onclick="{$action_comment_delete}">삭제</button>
                        <button type="button" class="button theme2 {$comment_reply_display|display}" onclick="{$action_comment_reply_new}">쓰기</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li>
            <li class="{$comment_reply_css}" id="{$comment_reply_id}">
                <div class="info">
                    <span class="point {$config.is_use_point|display}">
                        <img src="//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/board/ico_star{$comment_point_count}.png" alt="{$comment_point_count}점" height="10">
                    </span>
                    <span class="writer" title="작성자">{$comment_name}</span>
                    <span class="regdate" title="작성일">{$comment_write_date}</span>
                </div>
                <div class="comment">
                    <span class="spam {$is_spam_display|display}"><img src="//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/mobile_ko_KR/board/ico_spam.png" alt="스팸글" width="13"></span>
                    <span class="icon">{$icon_mobile}{$comment_icon_lock}</span>{$comment_content}
                </div>
                <div class="formGroup">
                    <div class="gLeft">
                        <button type="button" class="btnReply replyList {$comment_reply_list_display|display}" onclick="{$action_comment_view}">댓글의 댓글<span class="number">{$comment_reply_count}</span></button>
                    </div>
                    <div class="gRight">
                        <button type="button" class="button theme1" onclick="{$action_comment_update_new}">수정</button>
                        <button type="button" class="button theme1" onclick="{$action_comment_delete}">삭제</button>
                        <button type="button" class="button theme2 {$comment_reply_display|display}" onclick="{$action_comment_reply_new}">쓰기</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </li>
        </ul>
    </div>

    <div module="board_commentpaging_4" class="brdPaginate typeList">
        <a href="{$param_prev}" class="btnPrev">이전 페이지</a>
        <ol class="page">
            <li><a href="{$param_num}" class="{$param_class}">{$page_num}</a></li>
            <li><a href="{$param_num}" class="{$param_class}">{$page_num}</a></li>
        </ol>
        <a href="{$param_next}" class="btnNext">다음 페이지</a>
    </div>

    <div module="board_commentform_4" class="brdCmtModify">
        <div class="brdEditor">
            <fieldset>
                <legend>댓글 수정</legend>
                <strong class="titEditor">댓글 수정</strong>
                <div class="info">
                    <span class="name">{$form.comment_name}</span>
                    <span class="password">{$form.comment_password}</span>
                </div>
                <span class="comment">
                    {$form.comment_modify}
                    <span class="byte {$config.comment_size|display}"><strong class="current">{$comment_byte}</strong>/{$comment_size} byte</span>
                </span>
                <div class="formGroup">
                    <div class="gLeft">
                        <span class="secret {$comment_secret_display|display}">
                            <label>{$form.secure} 비밀댓글</label>
                        </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="gRight">
                        <a href="#none" class="button large theme1" onclick="{$action_comment_cancel_new}">취소</a>
                        <a href="#none" class="button large theme2" onclick="{$action_comment_update}">수정</a>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </fieldset>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div module="board_commentformsecret_4" class="formGroup cmtSecret">
        {$form.secure_password}
        <div class="gRight">
            <a href="#none" class="button large theme1" onclick="{$action_secret_submit}">취소</a>
            <a href="#none" class="button large theme2" onclick="{$action_secret_cancel}">확인</a>
        </div>
    </div>

    <div module="board_commentwrite_4" class="brdCmtWrite">
        <div class="brdEditor {$comment_write_display|display}">
            <fieldset>
                <legend>댓글쓰기</legend>
                <strong class="titEditor">댓글쓰기</strong>
                <div class="info">
                    <span class="name {$comment_input_name|display}">{$form.comment_name}</span>
                    <span class="password">{$form.comment_password}</span>
                </div>
                <p class="help {$password_rule_help_display|display}">영문 대소문자/숫자/특수문자 중 2가지 이상 조합, 10자~16자</p>
                <span class="comment">
                    {$form.comment}
                    <span class="byte {$config.comment_size|display}"><strong class="current">{$comment_byte}</strong>/{$comment_size} byte</span>
                </span>

                <div class="byteRating {$config.is_use_point|display}">
                    <strong class="label">평점</strong>
                    <span class="rating">
                        {$form.comment_point}
                    </span>
                </div>
                <div class="captcha {$config.use_captcha_comment|display}">
                    <span class="image">
                        {$captcha_image}
                        <span class="btnRefresh">{$captcha_refresh}</span>
                    </span>
                    <div class="form">
                        {$form.captcha}
                    </div>
                    <p class="help">위에 보이는 문자를 공백없이 입력하세요. (대소문자구분)</p>
                </div>

                <div class="formGroup">
                    <div class="gLeft">
                        <span class="secret {$comment_secret_display|display}">
                            <label>{$form.secure} 비밀글</label>
                        </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="gRight">
                        <button type="button" class="button large theme2 {$comment_button|display}" onclick="{$action_comment_insert}">등록하기</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </fieldset>
        </div>
        <div class="brdCmtAuthority {$comment_write_display_none|display}">
            {$comment_auth_name}에게만 댓글 작성 권한이 있습니다.
        </div>
    </div>

    <div module="board_commentreply_4" class="brdCmtReply">
        <div class="brdEditor {$comment_write_display|display}">
            <fieldset>
                <legend>댓글의 댓글쓰기</legend>
                <strong class="titEditor">댓글의 댓글쓰기</strong>
                <div class="info">
                    <span class="name {$comment_input_name|display}">{$form.comment_name}</span>
                    <p class="password">{$form.comment_password}</p>
                </div>
                <p class="help {$password_rule_help_display|display}">영문 대소문자/숫자/특수문자 중 2가지 이상 조합, 10자~16자</p>
                <span class="comment">
                    {$form.comment}
                    <span class="byte {$config.comment_size|display}"><strong class="current">{$comment_byte}</strong>/{$comment_size} byte</span>
                </span>

                <div class="captcha {$config.use_captcha_comment|display}">
                    <span class="image">
                        {$captcha_image}
                        <span class="btnRefresh">{$captcha_refresh}</span>
                    </span>
                    <div class="form">
                        {$form.captcha}
                    </div>
                    <p class="help">위에 보이는 문자를 공백없이 입력하세요. (대소문자구분)</p>
                </div>

                <div class="formGroup">
                    <div class="gLeft">
                        <span class="secret {$comment_secret_display|display}">
                            <label>{$form.secure} 비밀글</label>
                        </span>
                    </div>
                    <div class="gRight">
                        <button type="button" class="button large theme2 {$comment_button|display}" onclick="{$action_comment_insert}">등록하기</button>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </fieldset>
        </div>
        <div class="brdCmtAuthority {$comment_write_display_none|display}">
            {$comment_auth_name}에게만 댓글 작성 권한이 있습니다.
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div module="board_movement_4" class="brdPaginate typeBoard">
    <ul class="page">
        <li class="prev {$prev_display|display}"><strong class="label">이전글</strong><a href="{$link_board_detail_prev}" class="link">{$prev_subject}</a></li>
        <li class="next {$next_display|display}"><strong class="label">다음글</strong><a href="{$link_board_detail_next}" class="link">{$next_subject}</a></li>
    </ul>
</div>

<div module="board_listsgroup_4" class="boardListGroup">
    <div class="brdListTitle">
        <h3>관련글 보기</h3>
    </div>
    <ul class="brdList">
        <!--
            $count = 2
            $product_name_cut = 30
        -->
        <li>
            <a href="{$link_board_detail}" class="link">
                <strong class="subject">{$icon_re}{$icon_lock}{$icon_file}<span class="text">{$subject}</span><span class="commentCnt">{$comment_count}</span>{$icon_hit}{$icon_new}</strong>
                <span class="category">{$product_name}</span>
                <span class="info">
                    <span class="point {$point_display|display}"><img src="//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/board/ico_star{$point_count}.png" alt="{$point_count}점" height="10"></span>
                    <span class="id" title="작성자">{$writer}</span>
                    <span class="name">{$product_name}</span>
                </span>
                <span class="append">
                    <span class="date {$date_display|display}" title="작성일">{$write_date}</span>
                </span>
            </a>
        </li>
        <li>
            <a href="{$link_board_detail}" class="link">
                <strong class="subject">{$icon_re}{$icon_lock}{$icon_file}<span class="text">{$subject}</span><span class="commentCnt">{$comment_count}</span>{$icon_hit}{$icon_new}</strong>
                <span class="category">{$product_name}</span>
                <span class="info">
                    <span class="point {$point_display|display}"><img src="//img.echosting.cafe24.com/skin/dnd_ko_KR/common/module/board/ico_star{$point_count}.png" alt="{$point_count}점" height="10"></span>
                    <span class="id" title="작성자">{$writer}</span>
                    <span class="name">{$product_name}</span>
                </span>
                <span class="append">
                    <span class="date {$date_display|display}" title="작성일">{$write_date}</span>
                </span>
            </a>
        </li>
    </ul>
</div>
<!-- //MOMA COMPONENT ID 55 -->
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">

</script>
</div>
